name: Mama Is Sick
description:
This game was created by two Vancouver Film School students, Jaymee Mak and Guerric Haché, for the Ludum Dare 28 jam in December 2013. The theme for the jam was "You Only Get One" - so in Mama Is Sick, you only get one dollar a day on which to support a family.

We recently received a special request to make the game available again, and so have created a new functional build for everyone to play.

We've learned a lot about making games since creating this, but we enjoyed the experience of making this, and hope you find it interesting!
